summary: A bored young student falls for the young secretary of his rich friend's father. She senses some good in him and tries to make him discard his aimless lifestyle.
cast: Masahiko Tsugawa|Hizuru Takachiho|Yûsuke Kawazu|Junichiro Yamashita|Masao Mishima|Shôji Yasui|Kakuko Chino|Isao Sasaki|Yosuke Hayashi|Fumio Watanabe|Yôji Doki|Noboru Endô|Masanao Kawakane|Kôji Moriishi|Keizô Sasagawa|Kei Satô|Yoshihide Satô|Isao Suenaga|Kenji Tsukishima|Keiko Wakaba
title: Rokudenashi
